boardgame.name: The Walking Dead: All Out War
The Walking Dead: All Out War Miniatures Game
boardgame.description: The Walking Dead: All Out War is a tactical head-to-head game set in the walker-strewn Georgia countryside, a survival miniatures game from Mantic Games based on the characters from the pages of the bestselling The Walking Dead comic series. Your group will be pitted against other groups in a bitter fight for supplies, but the Walkers react to your every move. In this game, everyone and everything is trying to kill you._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In more detail, each player controls their own group of survivors made up of popular characters from The Walking Dead storyline, such as Rick, Shane, Michonne and many more. Each survivor is represented by a finely-detailed plastic miniature, which can be painted in your color scheme of choice. It comes with a character card highlighting their game stats and unique abilities, and it can be upgraded with a selection of weapon and equipment cards._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game is set around Atlanta and the surrounding suburbs, and contains a gaming mat and a selection of barricades, abandoned cars and supplies to give it that authentic The Walking Dead atmosphere. Your survivors move across the board using the measuring stick included with the game, and you use the terrain to block Walker routes, sneak up on opposing survivors, or raid enemy camps for supplies._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;During the game, you fight a bitter battle for resources against a rival group of survivors _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; but be careful not to make too much noise as you'll draw the attention of the Walkers, which are controlled by an AI system developed specifically for this game. They attack anyone who comes within reach _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; and because they are AI-controlled, you can play the game solo._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The base game includes rules for running simple campaigns and basic guidelines for designing your own characters._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2018 Origins Awards Best Miniature Game Nominee

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: This is for a sealed copy of the KS exclusive base game that includes all the stretch goals from wave 1. Includes Free Shipping!!

This is for the core game PLUS the Kickstarter Exclusive Figure Booster/Bundle, which includes every KS Exclusive figure from the Kickstarter Campaign: Negan Michonne Abraham Ronnie Walker Sheriff_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Badge Bag of Guns Shipping weight is approximately 3 pounds.

The Walking Dead: All Out War - Something To Fear Pledge (Wave 1 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Wave 2) - over $325 in retail value The Walking Dead: All Out War is a tactical head-to-head game set in the walker-strewn Georgia countryside, a survival miniatures game from Mantic Games based on the characters from the pages of the bestselling The Walking Dead comic series. Your group will be pitted against other groups in a bitter fight for supplies, but the Walkers react to your every move. In this game, everyone and everything is trying to kill you. All Items of Wave 1 are sealed, never opened in shrink, at hand and ready to ship (see pictures): The Kickstarter Edition of the Walking Dead: All Out War includes: Rick Grimes, Carl Grimes, Derek, Patrick, Sandra, Liam, Dale, Jim, Allen, Donna, Shane, Reggie, Lori, Craig, Andrea, Amy, Carol, Sophia, Negan KS exclusive, Abraham KS exclusive, Michonne KS exclusive, Arnold _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Lacey (Wave 2), Julie _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Chris (Wave 2), Maggie (Wave 2), Tyreese (Wave 2), Herschel _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Billy Greene (Wave 2), Glenn (Wave 2) 25 Walkers including Walker Ronnie and Walker Shane (KS Exclusive), Walker Shawn (Wave 2), Walker Julie (Wave 2) Green Farm Expansion (Wave 2) Plastic Initiative Badge Counter KS exclusive, 4 Plastic Cars, 6 Plastic Barricades, 11 Plastic Loot Piles, including KS Exclusive plastic molded Bag of Guns, 18 Custom Dice, KS exclusive Box Accept Paypal, Bitcoin or IBAN with BIC. I am a private seller, so if you have any questions just ask. You will only pay the shipping costs you want and need. I will get you a quote form your preferred shipping company beforehand. You are buying the full pledge, including all stretch-goals. So, understand that the Kickstarter has been shipped in 2 waves, you can determine yourself if you want to wait for the second wave or if you want Wave 1 first. Thanks for looking and enjoy!

The Walking Dead All Out War Collectors Edition perfect condition. Includes: Deluxe starter set, containing the Walking Dead: All Out War Core Game, the Prelude to Woodbury campaign and miniatures, a solo event deck, a Scenery Booster, a Roamer Booster, the Equipment Booster Vol. 1, the Lee and Clementine Booster, a Deluxe Gaming Mat, and exclusive Walker Rick, Scott Moon, and one-legged Dale miniatures! Also, Carl Grimes, Derek, Patrick, Sandra, Liam, and Brian Blake miniatures. One walker miniature is painted. Days Gone By expansion perfect condition. Includes six narrative scenarios, additional rules for fire and smashing objects, new scenery, and complete rules for creating your own Survivors. Can be played with any selection of miniatures, but will require the Andrea; Carol; Glenn; Lori; Morgan; Rick on Horse and Shane Boosters to play all scenarios with recommended participants. (You_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll receive all of these as well!) Andrea Booster, new. Carol Booster, new. Glenn Booster new. Lori Booster new. Morgan Booster new. Rick on Horse Booster new. Shane Booster new. The Farm Deluxe Mat new. Will ship from 55972. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m making room for my kick starter addiction. Haven_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t been able to get this to the table. Please let me know if you have any questions. Thanks for looking!
Shipping to the UK: £3.99 Unwanted present. Opened and played once.
